content.title: Liverpool to buy Adam Lallana
content.subtitle: Liverpool are in talks with Southampton over the purchase of Adam Lallana, but the two clubs are some way off coming to an agreement, according to reports.
content.body_text: The Express claims the the Reds are prepared to spend Â£20million on the England international, but his club continue to hold firm on their objective of getting as much money as possible. The 26-year-old has many admirers for the summer, and Manchester United have also been linked heavily with a bid to capture his signature.
